The aim test optimization nanoparticle sensor , base cyanine dye chemically link Fe/Fe3O4 nanoparticles via protease-selective consensus ( cleavage ) sequence . The matrix metalloproteinases , urokinase-type plasminogen activator , cathepsins , up-regulated vast majority progress cancer , therefore , serve marker cell survival/tumor progression , angiogenesis , tissue remodeling/invasion
